--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Serizawa Kamo <serizawakamo@y...> wrote:
> I went to Takasugi's house and indeed it was closed.
> There was a sign there warning that it was uncertain
> whether it would be reopen for general visitation
> again.
> 
> Meanwhile, I guess all the other houses are still
> open. Went to Katsura Kogoro's house, Yoshida Shoin's
> house (including Shokason-juku) and Ito Hirobumi's
> house.


Thank you for replying to my question. 
Truly, Takasugi's house was closed. 
(It is a very shocking fact.)

Takasugi is shishi which has many fans even now. 
If I confess honestly, I like him most on Ishin-shish side.
When I was a high school student, I visited that.
And I considered his thing in the small house and small yard.
It is already impossible experience now. 

However, thank you for teaching the situation of the present Hagi. 
Please continue a good travel. 


momoiro-usagi
